meanings.definition: The state or condition of being feebleminded.
meanings.sent1: Her feeblemindednesses made it difficult for her to understand complex ideas.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with feeblemindednesses after a series of tests.
meanings.sent3: Despite his feeblemindednesses, he always had a smile on his face.
meanings.sent4: The fog of feeblemindednesses clouded her thoughts like a dense mist.
meanings.sent5: The feeblemindednesses of the patient was evident in his inability to recall recent events.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being feebleminded.
meanings.sent1: The feeblemindednesses of the student affected his academic performance.
meanings.sent2: We must address the feeblemindednesses in our society with compassion and understanding.
meanings.sent3: His feeblemindednesses seemed to disappear whenever he played music.
meanings.sent4: The feeblemindednesses of the situation was like a dark shadow looming over them.
meanings.sent5: The feeblemindednesses of the decision was evident in its lack of logic.

meanings.sent1: The feeblemindednesses of the patient required specialized care.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the feeblemindednesses of others can help us be more empathetic.
meanings.sent3: His feeblemindednesses seemed to vanish whenever he was around animals.
meanings.sent4: The feeblemindednesses of the old building was evident in its crumbling walls.
meanings.sent5: The feeblemindednesses of the character added a touch of innocence to the story.
